activities: Passenger provides an internet based community software platform (Software as a Service) that allows our clients the ability to collaborate with their customers, stakeholders and peers across social, geographic and organizational boundaries. When members join communities on our platform, our clients may ask us to collect certain Personal Data and other information on their behalf.  This data is owned by our clients, but hosted and serviced by Passenger.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: As part of our participation in the Safe Harbor Program, we have agreed to use the Direct Marketing Association (DMA) dispute resolution for disputes relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Program. If you have any complaints regarding our compliance with the Safe Harbor Program you should first contact us as set forth below.  If contacting us does not resolve your complaint, you may raise your complaint with DMA through email at safeharbor@the-dma.org, by phone at (202) 861-2410, by fax at (202) 955-0085, or by mail at Safe Harbor Line, Direct Marketing Association, 1615 L Street, NW - Suite 1100, Washington, DC 20036, USA. DMA will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve your concerns.
